titles.title: A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of a President pro tempore.
A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of a President pro tempore.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Notifies the House of Representatives of the election of the Honorable Patrick J. Leahy as President of the Senate pro tempore.
